name: Shadowmaker
description:
Move the sun to make the shadow.


CONTROLS

[0-9] Colors

[Tap] Sun Control

[T] Toggle Time Mode

[SPACE] Toggle Play Mode
[<,>] Sun Speed

[Z,X] Static Strength

[P] Pause Motion

[S] Save Image


COLORS

Press number keys to change colors
[1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] [7] [8] [9] [0]

Press [8] for infinite random colors

Preset color palette will be unique, predetermined by a viewer's name and will always be the same for that logged in viewer.

On mobile swipe right for a random color, and swipe left to cycle preset colors.


TIME MODE

Sun will reflect position in sky throughout the day based on web browser time

Time mode is the initial state on load until interacted with.

Press [T] to toggle time mode


PLAY MODE

Press [SPACE] to toggle looping of sun cycle

Use [<] and [>] to control the speed/direction
